io.spine.code.javadoc

Class JavadocEscaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.code.javadoc.JavadocEscaper

  • public final class JavadocEscaper
extends java.lang.Object
    Escaper for a Javadoc text.

    If a Javadoc text received from a source, that has no knowledge of the Javadoc text restrictions, then such text should be escaped using escape(String).

    Example of such source is a comment from ".proto" file. In particular, a person that writes a comment in ".proto" file does not know, that "<" and ">" should not appear in Javadoc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JavadocEscaper.EscapeSequence
      Enumeration of the sequences, that should be escaped in a Javadoc text.

    • Method Detail

      • escape

        public static java.lang.String escape(java.lang.String javadocText)
        Escapes the JavadocEscaper.EscapeSequence from a Javadoc text.

        If a Javadoc text starts with a slash, it will be interpreted like a comment ending. To handle this case, we should add "*" before a Javadoc text.

        Parameters:
        javadocText - the unescaped Javadoc text
        Returns:
        the escaped Javadoc text
